meanings.definition: Plumpens (verb): to become fuller or rounder in shape
meanings.sent1: After eating a big meal, my stomach plumpens up.
meanings.sent2: The balloon plumpens as more air is blown into it.
meanings.sent3: The pumpkin plumpens as it grows bigger in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks plumpen with a rosy glow in the cold weather.
meanings.sent5: The ripe fruit plumpens on the tree, ready to be picked.

meanings.definition: Plumpens (adjective): having a full and rounded shape
meanings.sent1: The plumpens cat curled up on the cozy blanket.
meanings.sent2: She picked the plumpens apple from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The plumpens pillow was so soft and comfortable.
meanings.sent4: The plumpens clouds floated lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: His plumpens cheeks dimpled when he smiled.
